metadata.title: CVE-2018-1129 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the way signature calculation was handled by cephxauthentication protocol. An attacker having access to ceph cluster networkwho is able to alter the message payload was able to bypass signaturechecks done by cephx protocol. Ceph branches master, mimic, luminous andjewel are believed to be vulnerable.

criterions.comment: ceph package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
